commit message: Complete localization to Spanish
Translation to Simplified Chinese
Correct mistakes in Chinese translation
Update ru translation
Add region prefix to simplified Chinese translation
Add slovak translation
Add Portuguese translation
Add Japanese translation
Only pull owner into variable when repository is non-null
Hide loading bar when repository fails to load

Add checks for common non-repository owner names

This will prevent attempting to load repositories when
the owner of the repository is definitely invalid such
as the case for URL paths starting with blog, contact,
etc.
Add inbox to list of whitelisted repository owner names
Add notifications to whitelisted repository owner names
Move spinner height and width to top level ListSpinner styled

Add initial support for viewing a commit comparison

Push events can now be opened from the news feed and
a new activity will be started showing the diffs for all
the changed files in the pushed commits.
Move commit file comparator to own class

Add initial support for view a specific commit

News feed push events of a single commit now open
in the new CommitViewActivity which display the
message, author information, and file diffs.
Set commit message to be monospace
Return to repository view from CommitViewActivity
Decrease text size of commit message text view
Return to repository view from CommitCompareViewActivity
Display commits as headers above line differences
Open selected commits in new activity from compare view
Show parent commits in list and allow them to be opened
Color foreground of diff output instead of background
Label parent as 'parent commit' instead of just 'parent'

Add Commits page to RepositoryViewActivity

This will show the commits in a paging list
and selecting one will open the commit in a
new activity showing the diff and other details.
Lower case the s in URLs

Add commit URL matcher for links opened from within the app

This will allows commits to be opened when referenced from
issues, comments, etc.
Remove extra tests segment from package name
Correct typo in test method comment

Add support for opening commit URLs from outside intents

URLs being opened from outside the application that
reference a repository commit can now be opened to
display the selected commit.
Show a maximum of two lines of the commit message

Show avatars for commits made by non-GitHub users

The RepositoryCommit model may have a missing author
value and the e-mail address of the raw commit should
be used to lookup an avatar to display for those commits.

Mark private repositories as complete

If the private flag has already been set then treat
the repository model as one returned from an API call
or retrieved from the database.
updated german locale for the commit-strings
Add headers showing number of commits and additions/deletions

fix #105: restore headlines of repository view

* Flipping to 'Following' leads to the repository list being freed in
the view pager.
* Flipping back, the headlines are not restored (only during initial
repository loading).
updated sk translate

Clear last commit SHA-1 when clear() is called on pager

Previously the field was only cleared on calls to reset()
which would cause the wrong commits to display when the
refresh menu was invoked since the loaded commits would
start after the last page fetched and the currently
loaded commits would disappear.
Mark theme parameter as final

Use before field from push payload for base compare commit

Previously this field wasn't present and so the last commit
in the event was used instead which led to incorrect results.
Add missing override annotation
Add missing override annotation
cleanup: l10n: distinguish between self and others
duplicate all locales strings for 'followers' and 'following'
modify some translation details & add new strings from upstream

fault tolerance and performance in DiffStyler

* be robust against empty lines in patches (should not happen)
* put style into map only once instead of each loop iteration

more DiffStyler optimization (as per review)

* avoid endless loop
* avoid substring calculation for empty lines
Correct typo in dashboard string names
Correct spelling of messages in Spanish translation comments

Guard against patch lines with no trailing newline

Use the end of the patch string when no newline is
found from the current position being processed.

Use SHA-1 from only commit when list has a size of 1

Previously the before value was used which was incorrect
since the commit being pushed should be opened, not the
commit before the push occurred.
Correct typos in German and default strings.xml files
Updated 'following' string in Slovak translation

Display comments from CommitDiffListFragment

Currently all comments are shown at the bottom but will
eventually be shown inline when they are made against
a specific line in the diff.
Add ability to open commit comment events from news feed

Show commit comments inline with diffs

The CommitDiffListFragment now displays the commits
under the line where they were made.

Proper section dividers and padding is still needed.
Add bottom padding to commit diff lists
Correct pluralization of diff stat label text
Include trailing slash in directory path
Add background to commit_diff_file_header layout
Add dividers between commits in list
Use link style for parent commits
Add diff stats to commit_diff_file_header layout
Show committer details when available in commit_header layout
Decrease inner top/bottom padding to 5dp
Use link style for parent commit prefix
Use static import for constant from Paint class

Remove bottom padding on commit_header layout

All elements below have sufficient top padding
Add summary stats header view in CommitDiffListFragment
Show Toast notifications when loading fails

Add activity to view a file in a commit

This will open a specified path in a commit in
the source viewer and will be used by activities
that list the commit differences between one or
more commits.
Add unit tests of HttpRequestsUtils class
Add selected state to section background

Remove selected state from comment background

Comments are not currently selectable so feedback
on selected shouldn't be given.

Update incorrect license header

Was originally checked in as EPL, should have
been Apache.
Add missing override annotations
Add missing calls to superclass methods
Log exceptions when tasks fails

Add support for refreshing the CommitDiffListFragment

Menu option will now be used to refresh the commit
for cases when loading fails initially or when you
want to check for comment updates.

Add support refreshing the CommitCompareListFragment

This can be used if the initial load fails due to
connectivity issues.

Add support for opening selected open sourced events

This event occurs when a repository is made public
and will now open the repository when selected.
Correct ugly formatting when updating folder text view
Remove unneeded default block
Finalize method parameters in CommitFileListAdapter
Add missing override annotation
Set hasContextMenu to true from fragments

Iterate over array of info objects when clearing

Prevents a concurrent modified exception from being
raised.

Use head commit SHA-1 when opening a file

Previously the base was used for labeling the view
activity which was incorrect since the file contents
are as of the head commit, not the base commit.
Show number of comments in commit_item layout
Only fetch comments when count is greater than zero
Use commit SHA-1 hash code as item id
Provide items ids for comments and files in CommitFileListAdapter

Only show committer when name is different than author

This removes the check for different author/committer
dates and just used the name to determine whether to
show or hide the committer area.
Add newline before call to super
Left align comments with line they are made on
Add activity to comment on a commit
Open file when diff line is clicked in CommitCompareListFragment

Use comment position instead of line when indexing

Position is the line in in the diff itself which is
how diff lines are indexed in the adapter so position
must be used or the comments could be displayed on the
wrong line.
Decrease top/bottom padding in commit_parent_item layout

Add support for comment on commit line diffs

Selecting a diff line or diff comment from the
CommitDiffListFragment will now open a dialog prompting
to either view the entire selected file or comment on
the selected diff line.

Remove octicon constants from translation files

These should be the same no matter what local since
they are all icons from the Octicons font.

Update icon_comment Octicon value

Was previously the single comment icon but should have
been the one comment overlaid on top of another to be
consistent with the site.
Link to Google Play from main image

Add new strings to German locale

* error_file_load
* error_commit_load
* parent_prefix
* authored
* committed
Update Slovak locale
Translate new commit messages to Spanish
Add more strings to Russian translation

Forward scrolling requests from ViewPager to WebView

This is required on pre-ICS since horizontally scrolling
is difficult if not impossible when a WebView is hosted
in a ViewPager.

Closes issue #117
Add initial test of CreateCommentActivity
Remove unneeded if/else block for validating SHA-1
Add tests of CommitUtils helpers
Add unit tests of FullCommit class

Guard against null when creating parent directories

There was a crash report where parent file was null
and was going unchecked before exists() was called on
it causing an NPE and crash.
Mark method parameter as final

Open repository when search query is an exact match

If the search query entered is an exact owner/name repository
match then open the repository directly and finish the search
activity.

Closes issue #80
Decrement position from inside while loop test
Externalize string used for commit count header
Remove unused item view class for commit files
Support opening pull request uris

Add support for opening pull request URLs clicked internally

The would be originating from views such as comments
or the body of other issues.

Remove SuppressLint annotations

These appear cause errors when building with Maven

Extract icon strings into separate resource

This prevents these icons from ending up in localized
strings.xml files.

Add strings to German translation

* diff_line_message
* comment_on_line
* view_entire_file
* comparing_commits
Update Slovak translation
Prepare 1.1 release

Add support for swiping between commits

Use a view pager in CommitViewActivity so when a
commit is selected from a list the other commits
in the list are swipable from the initial commit
shown.
Use id variable when updating action bar title
Upgrade parent POM version to 1.1
